author: cbs8
title: Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel Offers Special Deals Just In Time For Holiday Season
text:
Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel
One of the premier hotels in Palm Springs extends advance purchase rate and Stay For Breakfast package
PALM SPRINGS, Calif. , Oct. 21, It's not too late to plan a holiday getaway at Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel . Travelers can start booking now and receive special rates for upcoming trips. Currently, the hotel is promoting its advance purchase rate and Stay For Breakfast package.
To enjoy a 15 percent discount on available room rates at the downtown hotel, guests must book seven days in advance of their desired travel dates. Guest rooms and suites at the hotel feature chic decor and an array of modern amenities. Stay connected with complimentary wireless Internet in all accommodations, and enjoy entertainment on flat-panel TVs with premium channels. Other hotel highlights include luxurious bedding, compact refrigerators and workspaces with large desks and ergonomic chairs for added comfort.
Another of the hotel's current offers is Marriott's popular Stay For Breakfast package, which allows guests to fuel up in the morning with healthy and hearty selections before heading out to explore everything the city has to offer. Available now through September 30, 2016 , the package includes guest accommodations and complimentary breakfast for up to two adults and two children under the age of 12.
Located in Downtown Palm Springs , the Renaissance hotel is just minutes from popular attractions and events . Take the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway into the breathtaking San Jacinto Mountains, or hit the greens at one of the city's pristine golf courses. Shop on the streets of downtown, or attend the 27 th annual Palm Springs International Film Festival in January. No matter what brings travelers to Palm Springs , there is never a shortage of things to do and sights to see.
Guests at Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel will also enjoy access to on-site dining at the hotel's celebrated restaurant, Date, which is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Choose from savory starters including street tacos and sticky rice crab cakes, and order up a main course of sesame seared tuna, fire-roasted shrimp pasta or bacon-wrapped salmon. Top off the meal with a made-from-scratch date cheesecake or wild berry creme brulee. Before or after a meal, enjoy refreshing cocktails at Rocks, the hotel's bar and lounge with indoor and outdoor seating spaces.
To take advantage of the Stay For Breakfast offer, book online using promotional code S4B, or call 1-800-228-9290. The advance purchase rate will automatically be applied when guests book at least seven days in advance of their stay. These two offers cannot be combined.
About Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel
Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel at 888 Tahquitz Canyon Way in Palm Springs, California is near the Palm Springs Convention Center, the Palm Springs Aerial Tramway and the Living Desert Zoo & Gardens. The hotel features 5 floors with 255 guest rooms, 155 suites and 15 meeting rooms totaling 30,000 square feet of event space. Other highlights include an on-site restaurant, bar and lounge as well as a state-of-the-art fitness center and outdoor heated pool. Complimentary wireless Internet is provided in all rooms, suites and public areas. For information, visit www.marriott.com/PSPBR or call 1-760-322-6000.
Learn more about Renaissance Hotels and Marriott International Inc.
